FuncDef:
The node-id command sets a node ID in the iFIT view.
The undo node-id command deletes a specified node ID from the iFIT view.
By default, no node ID is set in the iFIT view.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a node ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1048575.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In an iFIT instance, a network-wide flow ID is generated through a combination of a node ID (set manually) and node flow ID. To ensure that a unique network-wide flow ID is generated, run the node-id command to set a node ID.
Prerequisites
iFIT has been globally enabled using the ifit command.
Precautions
node-id can be modified only after all iFIT instances are deleted.
The node IDs configured for devices cannot be the same
